update.name: FileBot 5.0.0
update.title: New updates available
update.message:
FileBot 5.0.0
This release features:
+ Added episode order preferences
+ Added default presets
+ Added episode group tools
+ Enhanced format bindings
+ Enhanced auto-align behaviour
+ Added column edit behaviour
+ Added keyboard shortcuts
+ Enable TheTVDBv4
+ Enable HTTP/2
+ Lots of minor improvements and bug fixes
